  5. from django.conf import Settings as BaseSettings
  8. class AppSettings(BaseSettings):
  9. """
  10. A holder for app-specific settings.
  12. When :attr:`isolated` is ``False`` (the default) the holder returns
  13. attributes from the project's setting module, falling back to the default
  14. attributes provided in this module if the attribute wasn't found.
  15. """
  17. def __init__(self, isolated=False, *args, **kwargs):
  18. self.isolated = isolated
  19. self._changed = {}
  20. self._added = []
  21. super(AppSettings, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  23. def get_isolated(self):
  24. return self._isolated
  26. def set_isolated(self, value):
  27. if value:
  28. self._isolated_overrides = BaseSettings()
  29. self._isolated = value
  31. isolated = property(get_isolated, set_isolated)
  33. def revert(self):
  34. """
  35. Revert any changes made to settings.
  36. """
  37. for attr, value in self._changed.items():
  38. setattr(django_settings, attr, value)
  39. for attr in self._added:
  40. delattr(django_settings, attr)
  41. self._changed = {}
  42. self._added = []
  43. if self.isolated:
  44. self._isolated_overrides = BaseSettings()
  46. def __getattribute__(self, attr):
  47. if attr == attr.upper():
  48. if self.isolated:
  49. try:
  50. return getattr(self._isolated_overrides, attr)
  51. except AttributeError:
  52. pass
  53. else:
  54. try:
  55. return getattr(django_settings, attr)
  56. except AttributeError:
  57. pass
  58. try:
  59. return super(AppSettings, self).__getattribute__(attr)
  60. except AttributeError:
  61. if not self.isolated:
  62. raise
  63. return getattr(django_settings, attr)
  65. def __setattr__(self, attr, value):
  66. if attr == attr.upper():
  67. if self.isolated:
  68. try:
  69. super(AppSettings, self).__getattribute__(attr)
  70. except AttributeError:
  71. pass
  72. else:
  73. # Set the app setting to an isolated overrides that gets
  74. # checked before the project's settings.
  75. return setattr(self._isolated_overrides, attr, value)
  76. # Keep track of any project settings changes so they can be
  77. # reverted.
  78. if attr not in self._added:
  79. try:
  80. self._changed.setdefault(attr,
  81. getattr(django_settings, attr))
  82. except AttributeError:
  83. self._added.append(attr)
  84. return setattr(django_settings, attr, value)
  85. return super(AppSettings, self).__setattr__(attr, value)
